Need to be investigated for 3.0.

Do you remember any specifics about the situation?
Mmh. got first confused by bug 65955 since I was using Shift+Insert to paste.

We cannot reproduce this. Tracking down the code revealed that for some reason
the document has been set to null. This looks like the editor has been corrupted
even before paste command was invoked. Were there any other entries in your .log?

Created an attachment (id=12229)
The attached patch against jface.text adds guards to the code and clarifies the
API.

Fixed in HEAD.
Will be released into I200406171600
